content.text:
# President of the Chamber of Republics and Provinces of the Assembly of Yugoslavia

The President of the Chamber of Republic and Provinces was the presiding officer of one of the chambers of that legislature.
Below is an incomplete list of office-holders from 1974:
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Period
! Republic/Province
|-
|Zoran Polič
|1974–1982
|Slovenia
|-
|Nikola Kmezić
|1982–1983
|Vojvodina
|-
|Anton Bubić
|1983–1984
|Croatia
|-
|Milivoje Stijović
|1984–1985
|Montenegro
|-
|Metodi Antov
|1985–1986
|Macedonia
|-
|Milenko Bojanić
|1986–1987
|Serbia
|-
|Draško Popović
|1987–1988
| Bosnia and Herzegovina
|-
|Abaz Kazazi
|1988–1989
|Kosovo
|-
|Miran Mejak
|1989–1991
|Slovenia
|}
Sources
*Various editions of The Europa World Year Book
